game.name: Hit The Glow
game.description:
For all the individuals who like the neon things, Hit The Glow is a nice arcade game to try. The glowy particles and neon graphics will take you to a new world full of fun and entertainment possibilities. Your objective in this cool online game is to hit the core of the circle. Make sure to hit the red sides while avoiding the blue sides. Hey! There are unique and challenging levels to play through. Shoot the blue ball to clear each level! 
Choose any out of the four modes including classic, eliminate, expand and origin modes in this html4 puzzle challenge! Tap on the screen to throw glowy ball and show the world that you are an ultimate puzzle challenger! You would have 60 different and highly-addictive levels to try out. This means that each mode includes 15 levels to play. Do not forget to hit the center glow to finish each level. You would have multiple achievements and rewards to explore. 
Make sure to follow the tutorial for each mode before checking out the game. This will help you to understand how to interact with the game. The glowing shield pieces will surround a shiny orb. Capture the thrill of the perfect strike to complete all the levels successfully in skill color game! Try to expose the core by hurling your orb at the shield piece! You would lose if you hit the wrong color. All the best to put your shooting abilities to the test to get a bulls eye shot! Check out more adventure-based puzzle challenges to have fun, no download required!
